section.title: Digital products for a better world
section.description: We use the best available technology to help your ideas have the impact they deserve.

webapp.title: Impactful Web Applications
webapp.description: Crafting beautiful, lightning-fast web applications that empower positive change. 8 years of expertise in UI/UX and performance optimization for social impact.

website.title: Websites for every cause
website.description: From grassroots no-code to enterprise full-code: SEO-optimized, responsive websites that amplify your mission and resonate with your audience.

mobileapp.title: Mobile Apps for positive change
mobileapp.description: User-centric iOS and Android apps that drive engagement and create meaningful connections. Leveraging technology to make a difference, one tap at a time.

data.title: Data alaysis that empower
data.description: We help you collect, analyze and visualize data to make informed decisions and measure your impact. From data collection to data visualization, we've got you covered.

team.title: Friends and developers since 8 years
team.description: We believe in the power of technology to make the world a better place.

hero.subtitle: We're here to help you build a project that makes a difference.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent and competitve for more impact
pricing.description: We are proud to offer a great value for our senior expertise and highly efficient team work to help you achieve positive goals.

nonprofit.title: Non-profit
nonprofit.description: We help NGOs achieve their goals at a reduced cost.

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Our full collective dedicated to your success.

support.title: Unlimited Support
support.description: On your side for small changes and bug fixes.
